body.section:
This project contains utilities for various purposes:
mmm-util-core contains valuable utilities for general purpose (NLS, ISO-8601, generic value conversion, scanners, pattern compilers, etc.).
mmm-util-misc contains various utilities for general purpose (dealing with strings, etc.).
mmm-util-reflect contains utilities that help to deal with reflection, especially for java 5 features like annotations.
mmm-util-resource gives access to resources from classpath (or other sources).
mmm-util-pojo is an alternative approach to commons-beanutils that works with any POJO.
mmm-util-xml contains stuff for dealing with XML.
mmm-util-event makes the event-sender and receiver-pattern reuseable via java 5 generics.
mmm-util-http is an HTTP utility NOT wired up with the protocol (to be used for HTTPMU in UPnP).
